## <i class="fa-solid fa-graduation-cap"></i> Education

-   2021--Present \| **Ph.D.** *Experimental Psychology*, University of Granada. 

    - Ph.D. founded by an FPU grant awarded by the Spanish Ministry of Universities, supervised by [Juan Lupiáñez](https://www.ugr.es/personal/juan-lupianez-castillo) and [Miguel A. Vadillo](https://mvadillo.com/). My research focuses on the study of the learning conditions of Value-Modulated Attentional Capture (VMAC). Specifically, this thesis aims to test the extent to which we can consider VMAC as an implicit psychological process. 

-   2021--2022 \| **M.S.** *Cogntive and Behavioral Neuroscience*, University of Granada.

-   2016--2020 \| **B.S.** *Psychology*, University of Murcia
